knimeNode.name: HDF5 Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads dataSets and attributes from an HDF5 File.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads dataSets and attributes from an HDF5 File. The columns in the output table will be created by the dataSets and the flow variables by the attributes. Both will be named by the path within the file.

tab.name: File Chooser
tab.option: Select the path to the input file.

Specifies if the node fails for missing values. Missing values appear if the first dimension of the dataSet, which is the rowSize of the columns in the output, is not equal for every column. So the node fails at the first difference in the rowSize.

fullDescription.tab:
Specifies the included and excluded dataSets of the file.
The names of the dataSets are the paths within the file. The names of the columns additionally contain the dimensions in terms of their dimensions in the original dataSet without the first dimension which is considered as rowSize.
So this is the content of the output table.
The usage is based on the Column Filter.

Specifies the included and excluded attributes of the file. So these are converted to the flow variables of the output.
The usage is also based on the Column Filter.

ports.outPort: All included dataSets merged together by columns. The first dimension of the dataSets will be interpreted as rowSize and the remaining dimensions as columns.
